author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
After quitting upstreaming stuff into the Linux Kernel, Asahi Lina has returned again, this time to start linux kernel drama entirely of her own volition for something that the other person involves was happy to fix from the very first message.
